#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Cope when Your Fashion Favorite Stops Being Trendy
#Text=When a beloved fashion item you 've always adored suddenly becomes fashionable , it 's an amazing feeling to be ahead of the trend and suddenly hip !
#Text=But what happens when your favorite fashion item goes out of fashion and becomes a real style faux pas ?
#Text=Do you let go with great sadness or find other solutions ?
#Text=Here are some suggestions for coping .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Consider not wearing the item for a period of time until the next trend is well underway .
#Text=Usually there is a period of time during which an old trend is disdained and considered unworthy before it 's forgotten about .
#Text=By being patient , you can ride out the backlash and start wearing it again in about a year 's time .
#Text=Enjoy the sales ; stock up on this item at rock bottom prices !
#Text=Be aware that some fashion items remain " tainted " for a very long time , like 80s scrunchies or neon leggings .
#Text=In this case , you could be waiting a long time .
#Text=Reconfigure your fashion item .
#Text=Look to see if there is some other way you can wear your favorite fashion item that wo n't seem old trend .

#Text=For example , if you loved a certain piece of jewelry , maybe you can wear it or use it differently from the its use during the trend , such as sewing it onto a scarf , embellishing a belt with it , wearing it on a different part of your body , or using it as a hair accessory .
#Text=Try to think outside the square and find new ways to use it .
#Text=Stop wearing it from this point .
#Text=If you feel as if the trend has spoiled its specialness for you , maybe it 's time to give it up and move on anyway .
#Text=If this is the case , consider donating it to charity or passing on to a friend or family member keen to have it .
#Text=Turn it into a pretty or useful memento .
#Text=Perhaps you 've decided to stop wearing it but you 'd like to keep a memory of it .

#Text=Think about ways you can turn it into something else , like turning : jewelry into a framed picture , a scarf into a tablecloth , leggings into cat toys , sweaters into cushion covers , hats into a mannequin 's hat , a dress into a quilt , etc.
#Text=Be bold and buck the new trend .
#Text=If it is something that has always represented your signature style and is definitely you , consider ignoring its loss of trendy status and continue to wear it anyway .
#Text=For some items , especially classic pieces , this will be fairly easy to do , and if people know you 've always worn the item , they 'll expect you to keep wearing it anyway .
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=Formerly trendy fashion item(s)
